item.description:
How to Throw a Sucessful Revolution

At this meeting we will discuss the elements that are necessary to throw a successful revolution. We will compare elements of historical revolutions to current events in Egypt and elsewhere, to the elements of the revolution in the futuristic science fiction novel, THE MOON IS A HARSH MISTRESS (1966) by Robert A. Heinlein.

Seriously, this is a GREAT book!  Don't be put off by the text messaging style of writting.  You'll catch on soon enough and come to appreciate the book even more!  Pick it up and READ IT.  Like when do I recommend Science Fiction?  Seriously...its worth owning. 

See you at the meetUp!

psst....TANSTAAFL (There ain't no such thing as a free lunch)  EXCEPT at the book club!

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: How to Throw a Sucessful Revolution
